layout.name: Catalyst Royal
layout.description:
Modern Meets Vintage

The modern Catalyst template with a touch of class.  Present yourself as a creator of words in this template for bloggers and writers.

Modern typography and striking colors frame your writing in this content-centric template.  It features easy to navigate menus, a columns featuring your recent blog posts, a contact widget for your mailing list, and full threaded comments with Facebook and Twitter login.
layout.setup:
person_id = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("people", "default_biography") person = Roxiware::Person.find(person_id)
subtitle = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "subtitle") title = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("system", "title") title = person.full_name if title.blank?

books_menu_permission = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/main_menu/menu_root/child_2/permission") books_menu_permission.value = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("books", "enable_books") ? ((Roxiware::Book.all.count > 0) ? "guest" : "admin") : "super" books_menu_permission.save!
calendar_menu_permission = @current_layout.get_by_path("_/header_bar/main_menu/menu_root/child_3/permission") calendar_menu_permission.value = Roxiware::Param::Param.application_param_val("events", "enable_events") ? "guest" : "super" calendar_menu_permission.save!
layout.settings_form: <%= form_for :custom_settings, :url=> customize_layout_path(@layout.guid), :method=>"PUT" do |customize_form| custom_params = @layout.get_scheme_params(@layout_scheme).merge(@layout.custom_settings.h) content_tag(:ul, :class=>"tabs") do content_tag(:li, content_tag(:a, "Backgrounds")) + content_tag(:li, content_tag(:a, "Fonts & Colors")) end + content_tag(:div, :class=>"panes") do content_tag(:div, :id=>"background_pane") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("header_background_image"), :width=>1038, :height=>150, :id=>"header_background_image") + " " + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("background_image"), :id=>"background_image", :width=>1920, :height=>1200) + " " + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("body_background_image"), :id=>"body_background_image", :width=>1038, :height=>1200) + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("header_background_color"), :id=>"header_background_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("body_background_color"), :id=>"body_background_color") + param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("background_color"), :id=>"background_color") end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"colors_pane") do content_tag(:div, :id=>"left_fields") do param_field(customize_form, custom_params.delete("home_page_splash_image"), :width=>728, :height=>450, :id=>"home_page_splash_image") end + content_tag(:div, :id=>"right_fields") do custom_params.values.sort{|x,y| x.name <=> y.name}.collect do |param| param_field(customize_form, param, :id=>param.name) end.join("").html_safe end end end + button_tag("Save", :class=>"save_button", :id=>"save_button", :type=>"submit") end %>
